entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Guelph
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Guelph Turfgrass Institute 7:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -2.0°C
Wind: SW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Temperature rising to zero this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Temperature rising to zero this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 6:44 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:44 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening. Forecast issued 6:44 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 70 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 6:44 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 6:44 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
